alert.note: Alert for Monroe; Morgan; Owen (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 24 at 12:41PM EDT until March 26 at 4:00AM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana... White River at Ravenswood. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... East Fork White River at Seymour. White River below Eagle Valley Power Plant, Centerton, Spencer, Hazleton, Newberry, Petersburg, Edwardsport, Elliston. .Rainfall totals late last week as high as one inch, and additional rainfall of one to two plus inches from Tuesday through today, is leading to lowland flooding along the entire length of the Wabash River, on the White River from Centerton downstream, and on the East Fork White River at Seymour. Flooding on the Wabash and White is expected to last into the first week of April, and on the East Fork White until March 26. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River below Eagle Valley Power Plant. * WHEN...Until early Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 603.5 feet, Blue Bluff Road just north of Blue Bluff Bridge has about six inches of water on it. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 603.4 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 603.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
